IN.IC: je lahko tudi preteklik od glagola
v tem slovarju pa besedi obravnavamo ločeno.

sense.def:
Če je nekdo rekel ali pomislil, da nekaj
would happen
, je rekel ali pomislil, da se bo nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: I felt confident that everything would be all right.
He made me promise that I would never break the law.

sense.def:
Izraz
would
uporabimo, kadar govorimo o posledici ali učinku možnega položaja.

seg.quote: If you can help me I would be very grateful.
Without them life would not be the same.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
would do something
, je pripravljen nekaj storiti.

seg.quote: Some men would do more for a dog than they would for a wife.
Though we were as rude as possible, she wouldn't go.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
would like to do or have something
, želi tisto storiti ali imeti.

seg.quote: Posy said she'd love to stay.

sense.def:
Izraz
would
uporabljamo v vljudnih vprašanjih ali prošnjah.

seg.quote: Would you tell her that Adrian phoned?
Put the light on, Bryan, would you?

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
would do something
, je značilno ali je bilo značilno zanj, da nekaj stori ali je storil na določen način.

seg.quote: ‘Of course you would say that,’ says Miss Callendar.
I used to meet her and she would say ‘Can't stop. I must get home.’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
would
ali
would have
izrazimo svoje mnenje o nečem, kar mislimo, da je resnično ali je bilo resnično v preteklosti.

seg.quote: I would think that in our climate we might have a few problems.
I would have thought that his chief asset was his enthusiasm.
We had a discussion on jazz, but you wouldn't remember that.
She wouldn't have noticed. She was too far away.

sense.def:
Kadar govorimo o tem, kar
would have happened
, če bi se pred tem nekaj zgodilo, govorimo o posledici ali učinku preteklegadogodka.

seg.quote: If the bosses had known that he voted Liberal, he would have got the sack.

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da nekdo
would have liked or preferred something
, hočemo povedati, da je nekdo želel nekaj storiti ali imeti, vendar ni mogel.

seg.quote: I would have liked a year more.
